name: Reese Redman
title: Computer Science & CyberSecurity Student
summary: Enthusiastic Computer Science and CyberSecurity student with a deep passion for learning and problem solving. Thrives in collaborative environments, and looking to continuously expand my skill set through hands-on projects and challenges. Motivated to contribute and adapt, and grow while helping build effective solutions.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science & CyberSecurity

experience.title: System Engineer Intern
highlights: Executed data security audits ensuring compliance with GDPR, NIST, and governmental regulations for enterprise clients
Supported secure data destruction processes using proprietary Track-Contain-Destroy-Verify methodology
Configured servers and contributed to automation scripting for IT asset management systems
Assisted in documentation and compliance reporting for ISO-certified data eradication services

experience.title: Web Development Intern
highlights: Built and deployed mobile-responsive website using Django and vanilla JavaScript
Developed custom application forms and secure user authentication systems
Delivered project on time while managing multiple client requirements and deadlines
Integrated user registration, authentication, and secure client communication features
Designed customizable job application forms and contact management system

leadership.description: Participate in team meetings, contribute to collaborative development projects, and engage in technical discussions
Lead discussions, mentor peers, and foster team collaboration
Develop discipline, teamwork, and time management through competitive sport
